medical.prompt_template: Focus on rescuing casualties in highest-severity disaster zones for people.

infrastructure.prompt_template: Protect power lines and roads. Even if severity is high elsewhere, prioritize built structures.

logistics.prompt_template: Minimize travel cost. Quickly move to nearest active zone if severity is above 5.

medical_urgent.prompt_template: Primary focus on immediate life-threatening situations. Always prioritize highest severity cases.

medical_preventive.prompt_template: Focus on preventing situation escalation. Consider future risks when choosing targets.

infrastructure_power.prompt_template: Protect power infrastructure first. Power outages can cascade into bigger problems.

infrastructure_roads.prompt_template: Keep transportation routes clear. Prioritize road access for emergency services.

logistics_speed.prompt_template: Optimize for rapid response. Choose closest high-severity targets.

logistics_efficiency.prompt_template: Optimize for resource efficiency. Consider travel costs and resource usage carefully.
